WRITING.TEXT: Can you send me a link to the apk?
Give Me A Sign - Breaking Benjamin It's such an emotional song it reminds me of my grandparents and everytime I hear it I break down crying.
Unlocking locked doors. I've gotten into many locked rooms with just a credit card and a lever such as a screwdriver. There is no damage to the lock and it's useful if I forget my keys.
Spongebob. Grew up watching it as a kid. Now I watch it almost every day. The classics are where it's at though. "Is mayonnaise an instrument?"
